meanings.sent1: The radiophotos from the event were clear and detailed.
meanings.sent2: I received the radiophotos of the landscape on my phone.
meanings.sent3: The spy mission involved sending radiophotos of the secret documents.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a collection of radiophotos, capturing moments in time.
meanings.sent5: The radiophotos of the rare bird made it easier for scientists to study its behavior.

meanings.definition: The process of transmitting photographs by radio.
meanings.sent2: We learned about the history of radiophotos in our science class.
meanings.sent3: The aliens communicated through radiophotos, making it hard for humans to understand.
meanings.sent4: The radiophotos process was as quick as sending a text message.
meanings.sent5: The radiophotos transmission was interrupted by a sudden storm.
